name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Forward Deployed Engineer with 13+ years of experience leveraging a strong foundation in **Python** and **TypeScript** to develop and deploy high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in creating robust **REST APIs** and adept in technical problem-solving, ensuring seamless client interactions and satisfaction. Proven ability to implement features such as **speech-to-text**, **embeddings**, and **diarization** within applications, enhancing functionality and user engagement.

Strong business acumen complemented by exceptional communication skills allows for an agile response to client needs. Expertise in both frontend and backend development, utilizing a versatile tech stack that includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms focused on predictive analytics within a compliance-driven environment (HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2). Skilled in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** alongside microservices, event-driven architectures, and comprehensive CI/CD pipelines. Additionally, a solid background in MLOps is demonstrated through proficiency in model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
- Leveraged **Python** and **TypeScript** for building robust **REST APIs** to facilitate real-time data processing and client interactions in health and finance sectors.
- Demonstrated exceptional **technical problem-solving** skills while addressing complex challenges in full-stack development, ensuring seamless integration of various technologies.
- Engaged with clients to gather requirements and provide tailored solutions, showcasing a strong **client-focused mindset** and business acumen throughout project lifecycles.
- Designed efficient data processing pipelines and integrations for **speech-to-text** functionalities, implementing **embedding** techniques for enhanced data analysis and insights.
- Ensured high standards of system reliability and security while delivering solutions for sensitive applications, meeting compliance with key regulations including HIPAA and GDPR.
- Applied advanced **communication skills** to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, leading to successful deployment of innovative solutions that meet client needs.
- Contributed to comprehensive technical documentation and reporting, enhancing knowledge sharing and project transparency across teams.
- Managed projects involving iterative development cycles, maintaining flexibility to adapt solutions based on evolving client requirements and feedback.

Utilized **Python** to modernize core financial platforms, migrating to microservices architecture with frameworks including Node.js (NestJS/Express) and Python (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Developed and implemented **REST APIs** to facilitate seamless integration between diverse systems and applications.
Created interactive front-end applications using **TypeScript**, **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to design intuitive, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with **instant insights** into transactions and anomalies through data visualization.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to ensure **asynchronous communication** across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed **ETL pipelines** for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling both batch and real-time processing for timely data availability.
Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, with model accuracy exceeding **90%**.
Created ML pipelines for **real-time credit scoring**, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, reducing processing time to under **5 seconds**.

Utilized **Python** and **TypeScript** to design and optimize backend services, delivering REST APIs for a global e-commerce platform with high availability and low latency across key modules like checkout and cart.
Employed technical problem-solving skills to engineer real-time features using **WebSockets**, **Kafka**, and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking.
Implemented a client-focused mindset to develop frontend applications using **React** (18) and **Vue 3**, ensuring fast and responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms, achieving an enhancement of user engagement by **30%**.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant access for high-traffic workflows and achieving a read performance improvement of **40%** through effective caching strategies.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation systems using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and enhance conversion rates by **25%** based on real-time user behavior.
Applied strong business acumen in implementing Redis caching for product metadata and shopping cart sessions, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing database read pressure.
Executed feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, enabling controlled rollouts and major platform update risk mitigation.
Built secure payment workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance by applying tokenized transactions for sensitive data handling.
Ensured user data protection and GDPR compliance by applying role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access.
